resources.string: Welcome to the Great Barrier Reef Quiz
1) Where is the Great Barrier Reef located?
2) You can see the Great Barrier Reef from space.
3) Which of the following are threats to the Great Barrier Reef?
4) The Great Barrier Reef is about the size of 70 million football fields!
5) The Great Barrier Reef is one of the seven natural wonders of the world.
To learn what you can do to help, please visit the following link \nhttps://www.nature.org/ourinitiatives/urgentissues/oceans/coral-reefs/ways-to-help-coral-reefs/index.htm
6) The outbreak of which creature has been considered a threat to the Great Barrier Reef?
